Service Details: - Provides a secure web application to connect patients with healthcare providers for private video visits- Patients visit with a licenced physician to discuss a variety of conditions, for general consultations, counseling, prescriptions, lab requisitions, referrals to specialists, and other conditions this service is NOT meant for people suffering from medical emergencies- Doctors will NOT renew prescriptions for narcotics or stimulants
Hours: Mon-Thu: 9:00am - 6:00pmFri: 9:00am - 5:00pmSat: 9:00am - 3:00pmSun, Stat. Holidays: 9:00am - 10:00pmVIRTUAL CLINIC WAIT TIMES:  between 10-20 minutes after initial sign up but may increase based on workload of the physicians and availability of a virtual doctor
Eligibility: - You will be required to provide your health card number (located on your BC CareCard or BC Drivers Licence) and a current email address- Appointment is necessary- NOTE:  this service is provided at the Revolutionary Pharmacy location and is NOT available from a home computer
Cost: Service ; - Physicians bill for the visit as they would at a walk-in clinic- Revolution Pharmacy does not charge an additional cost for the visit- You will be required to provide your health card number (located on your BC CareCard or BC Drivers Licence) when you make your appointment
Major Intersection: Hwy 33 W and Rutland Rd N
